pageTitle: Saturday, January 15, 2011 Baltimore Ravens - Pittsburgh Steelers Box Scores, Game Results & Summary - USATODAY.com
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {44564=Aided by a defensive holding call, the Steelers scored five plays later when Mendenhall made a sharp cut at the line and burst into the end zone with 1:33 remaining., 48094=Shaking off the Pittsburgh rally, the Ravens tied the game on Billy Cundiff's 24-yard field goal with 3:54 remaining. But they could have had seven points -- Lardarius Webb spun and deked his way to a 55-yard punt return touchdown that was negated by a holding call, and Anquan Boldin dropped a pass in the end zone.}
